summary: This mod adds a fully functional, craft able skooma pipe, a skooma bar and more to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=6]Skooma Bar And More[/size]
[/u]

[u][b][size=3]Skooma Bar:[/size][/b][/u]

This mod adds a skooma bar to the Ratway in Riften (where Gian the Fist lives). You can find many new things there like:
-a fully functional, craft able skooma pipe
-a merchant who sells all kinds of skooma and more
-places where you can refill your empty skooma or sleeping tree sap bottles
-some NPC's 
-anvil, cooking pot etc.
-new varieties of skooma 

Just take a look around.

[u][b][size=3]Skooma Pipe:[/size] [/b][i](meshes and textures are from "Stroti Resource Pack II" by [b]Stroti and Tamira, see credits below[/b])[/i][/u]

[u]There are two types of pipes: [/u]

-The "Activator Pipe"- its a static object in the Bar. You can chose from 3 different moonsugar-tastes, when you press "E". 

-The "Misc Pipe"- this one you can pick up, craft, sell etc. To use it, remove it from your inventory and select it with "E", a menu will show up. 
[u]Important :[/u] You need 1 moonsugar and 1 charcoal, otherwise the option "smoke" will not show up!!! Also if you select "smoke" or "exit" the pipe may teleport to your characters feet, so dont worry its not gone.

I know, it actually should be called "Moonsugar Pipe".

[b][u][size=3]Refill your bottles:[/size]

[/u][/b]When you enter the Bar, you will notice a shelf with two barrels, skooma and sleeping tree sap. Select it with "E", you need 1 empty skooma/sleeping tree sap bottle!

[b][u][size=3]Craft your Pipe:[/size]
[/u][/b]
You can craft it at any forge/anvil. 

[b][u][size=3]New Skooma:[/size]

[/u][/b]I added 3 new types of skooma. All of them are craft able. I diddnt make recipes for the vanilla skooma types because there are other mods, that include them. 

[size=3][b][u]Warning![/u][/b][/size] The "Khajiit Eye Skooma" may have a bug. Sometimes the night eye effect wont turn off after 1 min, just save your game before and try it out. If the bug happen, dont use it. :(

[size=4][b][u]Installation:

[/u][/b][/size]Just drag the files into your data folder.

[size=4][u]Compatibility:[/u][/size]

This mod is not compatible with mods that edit the same location.
But it should be compatible with everything else, i played it with 150+ mods- no problem. 

[size=4][u]Credits/special thanks:[/u][/size]

-Meshes and textures of the Skooma Pipe are from "Stroti Resource Pack II" by Stroti and Tamira. Thank you!
 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64590/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64590/?[/url]
author: skoomaface
